lead_paragraph: The National Hockey League on Wednesday filed a lawsuit against its players union, seeking to restore a 20-game suspension against Calgary Flames defenseman Dennis Wideman that a "neutral" arbitrator later cut in half.

headline.print_headline: NHL Sues Players Union to Restore Calgary Defenseman's 20-Game Ban
headline.main: NHL Sues Players Union to Restore Calgary Defenseman's 20-Game Ban

snippet: The National Hockey League on Wednesday filed a lawsuit against its players union, seeking to restore a 20-game suspension against Calgary Flames defenseman Dennis Wideman that a "neutral" arbitrator later cut in half....
